headline: Harriet Frank Jr., a Screenwriter for ‘Hud’ and ‘Norma Rae,’ Dies at 96
abstract: She and her husband, Irving Ravetch, were among Hollywood’s most successful and literate script writers, collaborating on movies like “Hud” and “Norma Rae.”
lead_paragraph: Harriet Frank Jr., who collaborated with her husband, Irving Ravetch, on provocative screenplays that explored the social conflicts and moral questions of postwar American life in movies like “Hud” and “Norma Rae,” died on Tuesday at her home in Los Angeles. She was 96.
